A lifelong theater enthusiast, D. J. Stevenson is thrilled to return to Apple Hill Playhouse. She previously worked on Inspecting Carol; Sex, Love & the I.R.S; Jesus Christ Superstar; and Annie (the last two at the Palace in Greensburg). Besides loving all things theatrical, she is an avid fan of music and movies, reading and television. Bilingual thanks to living in Germany, she worked as a translator and interpreter and enjoys studying history and architecture.
